# swum: SVD With Uncertainty Measures
[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/dcgerard/swum.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/dcgerard/swum)
[![AppVeyor Build Status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/github/dcgerard/swum?branch=master&svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/dcgerard/swum)

## Description

Some ideas I have to account for uncertainty in SVD-type mean models.

## Installation

To install, run in R:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("dcgerard/swum")
```
